survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate wellness programs in improving employee health and productivity.

questions.question_text: How long have you participated in your company's wellness program?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice response. Ensure options cover all possible participation durations.

script.question_text: How long have you participated in your company's wellness program?

questions.question_text: Which wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an option for non-participation.

script.question_text: Which wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your company's wellness program? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice response. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your company's wellness program? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your company's wellness program?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your company's wellness program?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'

questions.question_text: Has your participation in the wellness program positively impacted your overall health and well-being?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is not 'I have not participated'
